text:
You can use create a sandbox in your portal and use  the command bellow to upload your changes em sandbox portal to view.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli>
```hs watch --account=<name> <src> <dest>```
When finish, you can use a continuous integration with github to deploy the changes to production enviroment.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration>
